a spy - a) a man who keeps close and secret watch on another or others; b) a man employed by a government to get secret information about or monitor the affairs, plans, armed forces, etc. of another government; c) a man employed by a company, as in industry or commerce, to discover the business secrets of another company.

the department of a government engaged in investigating various offences, giving the government, what is going on in secret or, before-hand information what might happen, etc.; intelligence department.

the small, evergreen tree Garcinia morella of Guttiferae family, that yields gum resin which is used as a yellow pigment and as a cathartic; the true gamboge tree.
a moving to and fro or hither and thither.
a turning or spinning motion of a body around a centre or axis; rotation.
a try, esp. a hard try; attempt; effort.
an earnest attempt or effort; an endeavour.
wicked or criminal (but, pretentiously harmless).
a wicked or criminal man (who looks innocent).
a wicked or malicious woman (who looks harmless).
(usu. in pl.) the feet of a religious teacher, priest or seer.
(fig.) a revered religious teacher, priest or seer.
a thin sphere of liquid enclosing air etc; a bubble.
an inflamed pus-filled swelling caused by infection or an abnormal protuberance on or in the body; a boil; a swelling.
a hard outer covering, as of a mollusc, insect, etc.; a shell.
a small, circular band of metal, usu. of silver, worn by a married woman on the second toe; a toe-ring.
anything that is spherical; a ball or ball-like thing.
a piece of armour of esp. metal, carried on the arm or in the hand to deflect blows from the head or body; a shield.
a mark; a sign.
the object to be attained; an aim.
a purpose; an intention.
a dividing line between two countries, states, etc. or the land along it; frontier ; border.
= ಗುರಿಯಿಡು.
(masc.) a skilled archer; a marksman.
(masc.) an officer appointed by a king to head a department in the palace or a village, etc.; a headman.
the skill of archery.
the office, duty of the head of a department of a palace or of a village.
the plant Mackenziaea integrifolia ( = Strobilanthas integrifolius, = S. perfoliates) of Acanthaceae family.
the tree Bridelia retusa of Euphorbiaceae family.
= ಗುರಿಗಾರಿಕೆ.
= ಗುರಿಕಾರ.
= ಗುರಿಕಾರತನ.
a kind of children's play (prob. hitting a target as with a ball, stone, etc.).
= ಗುರಿಯಿಡು.
= ಗುರಿಕಾರತನ.
to miss hitting the target.
(fig.) to fail (in achieving something aimed at).
(an arrow, bullet, etc.) to hit the target.
(one's effort, aim, purpose) to become successful; to turnout as planned or attempted to succeed.
(fig.) (the intended message, hint, implication, etc.) to be understood by the person (to whom it is intended to be communicated indirectly).
to keep an object to hit as with a bullet, arrow etc.; to direct or point (a weapon, remark, etc.); to aim at.
= ಗುರಿಮಾಡು.
to hit at (without fail); to establish (something) as a target.
to fix an object as a target (to hit, shoot, at).
to fix something as an aim (for one's study).
to target a person as an object for insinuation.
to cause a person undergo a trial or punishment.
to hit at the target (without fail).
to succeed in doing (something intended); to accomplish; to achieve; (one's effort, attempt) to succeed; to reach one's intended destination.

Arundhati, a star of less magnitude situated among several visible stars in most conspicuous north constellation Ursa Major(between Lynx and Draco constellations) (looked on as a symbol of ideal house-wife by the bride during her marriage).
to become the object or aim for being hit (as by an archer, shooter, etc.).
to become the target-person to be punished, insinuated.
= ಗುರಿಯಿಡು.
to point (a weapon) or direct (a blow, remark, etc.) so as to hit; to aim at.
(fig.) to direct (one's efforts).
the niger plant Guizotia abyssinica of Asteraceae family.
its seed.
= ಗುರಿಮುಟ್ಟು.
= ಗುರಿಯಿಡು.
= ಗುರಿಮುಟ್ಟು.
the indistinct sound as made in the throat.
a sound imitating it.
hard to lift or move because of great weight; weighty; heavy.
of much more than ordinary size, extent, volume, etc.; great or greater.
having (more) importance or influence; of consequence.
that which is difficult to understand, achieve, manage, etc.
a person who teaches whether or not as a profession; a teacher.
a person who initiates, admits or baptizes into a religion or religious order.
a religious preacher.
one's male parent; father.
a person whose function is to make sacrificial offerings and perform other religious rites; a priest.
a venerable person.
Břhaspati, the preceptor of gods.
the head of a monastery of a religion.
(astrol.) Jupiter, one of the nine planets that are believed to influence human lives.
a long syllable that is considered as being two times the short one, in prosody.
a sign (-) used to represent this.

ಗುರು ಹಿರಿಯರು guru hiriyaru (pl.) one's elders, teachers and advisors (often used as a general term for elders); ಗುರುವಿಗೇ ತಿರುಮಂತ್ರ ಹೇಳು guruvigē tirumantra hēḷu (prov.) to teach the techniques to a person from whom one has learnt; to behave arrogantly with one's preceptor, advisor, etc.; ಗುರುಕೊಟ್ಟ ಜೋಳಿಗೆಯೆಂದು ಗೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸಿಗಿಸೆದರೆ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ತುಂಬೀತೆ? guru koṭṭa jōḷigeyendu gūṭakke sigisidre hoṭṭe tumbīte? (prov.) to get the fruit, one must work hard, rather than counting on the grace of god or one's preceptor; ಗುರುವಿಗೆ ಗುಟುಕು ನೀರು, ಶಿಷ್ಯನಿಗೆ ಎಣ್ಣೆಮಜ್ಜನ guruvige guṭuku nīru, śiṣyanige eṇṇe majjana (prov.) while the deserved starves, the undeserved or less deserved is bestowed with all the enjoyments; ಗುರುವಿಗೆ ಇರುವೆ ಕಚ್ಚದೆ? guruvige iruve kaccade (prov.) an individual's honour, merit or renown does not protect one from pain or agony that come in the natural course.
